Woman Suffrage Designs at suffragettecity100 Zazzle Shop

By Ohio Suffrage Centennial on January 28, 2019

We just learned about the suffragettecity100 Zazzle shop. The shop has a variety of attractive designs commemorating the woman suffrage movement and more than 160 items, from magnets and stickers to jewelry and ornaments. Thereâ€™s even a skateboard!
